data.text: @attorneydad Horse hockey.  If you love them, see if they can be fixed.  ☺️
@atntmomjd Cheap shoes can’t be saved, or so I’m told.
@attorneydad Are the uppers worth saving?  Maybe get you a new set of soles at the shoe hospital?
@attorneydad I rotate 3 pairs of good dress shoes and resole once a year for $60 a pair. I have sprung for the more expensive dress shoes after I burned through a few cheap ones.
